name: Glittering Gemstones
effect: A little surprise from the Children of Echoes.
description: Multicolored biscuits. First, use dough to create a gemstone fitting, before adding jam of different colors and flavors to the setting. The result resembles nothing so much as an exquisite gemstone pendant, but be careful not to mix them up with the real thing!

suspicious.effect: A little surprise from the Children of Echoes.
suspicious.description: Multicolored biscuits. This is exhausting to chew, almost as if your teeth are grinding against real gemstones... Perhaps you might even cause mortal hurt to your foes with this, were you to throw them from a hidden location in battle and catch them unawares.

normal.effect: A little surprise from the Children of Echoes.
normal.description: Multicolored biscuits. First, use dough to create a gemstone fitting, before adding jam of different colors and flavors to the setting. The result resembles nothing so much as an exquisite gemstone pendant, but be careful not to mix them up with the real thing!

delicious.effect: A little surprise from the Children of Echoes.
delicious.description: Multicolored biscuits. The sour and sweet jam gives off the clear luster of crystalline form, adding a shine to the crunchy treats. Such radiance! Such tastiness! What could this be but equal even to the most precious jewels?
